```{r driv_cov, results = 'asis', echo = F}
# header params
knit_header <-
  '```{r, echo = F, include = T, message = T, fig.align = "center", fig.pos = "H", out.width = "600px"}'

# initialise chunks
chunks <- c()

# grab all pngs
genes %>%
  sort() %>%
  purrr::walk(function(gene) {

    # gene title
    chunks <<- c(chunks, paste("\n##", gene))

    p_exonic_cov <- file.path(cov_dir, "genes", gene,
                              paste0(gene, "_exonic_coverage_plot.png"))
    if (file.exists(p_exonic_cov)) {
      knit_plot <- c(
        '', knit_header,
        paste0('knitr::include_graphics("', p_exonic_cov, '")'),
        '```', '')
      knitted_plot <-
        knitr::knit_child(text = knit_plot, envir = environment(),
                          quiet = TRUE)
      chunks <<- c(chunks, knitted_plot)
    }

    # mutation plot
    p_muts <- list.files(mut_dir, full.names = TRUE,
                         pattern = paste0("_targeted_Panel_", gene, ".png"))
    for (p in p_muts) {
      chunks <<- c(chunks, paste("\n###", basename(p)))
      knit_plot <- c(
        '', knit_header,
        paste0('knitr::include_graphics("', p, '")'),
        '```', '')
      knitted_plot <-
        knitr::knit_child(text = knit_plot, envir = environment(),
                          quiet = TRUE)
      chunks <<- c(chunks, knitted_plot)
    }

    # get runs
    ss %>%
      dplyr::transmute(run = paste(kit, seq_type, id, sep = "_")) %>%
      dplyr::pull(run) %>%
      sort() %>%
      purrr::walk(function(run) {

        chunks <<- c(chunks, paste("\n###", run))

        p_paths <-
          expand.grid(file.path(cov_dir, "runs", run, gene, run), gene,
                      c("genic", "exonic", "ccds"), c("cov", "cov_pct"),
                      "plot.png") %>%
          dplyr::arrange(Var4, Var5) %>%
          tidyr::unite("path", everything(), sep = "_", remove = FALSE)

        for (p in p_paths$path) {

          chunks <<- c(chunks, paste("\n####", basename(p)))

          if (file.exists(p)) {

            knit_plot <- c(
              '', knit_header,
              paste0('knitr::include_graphics("', p, '")'),
              '```', '')
            knitted_plot <-
              knitr::knit_child(text = knit_plot, envir = environment(),
                                quiet = TRUE)
            chunks <<- c(chunks, knitted_plot)

          } else {

            chunks <<- c(chunks, paste("\nNo coverage plot found at", p))

          }
        }

      })
  })

# return
cat(unlist(chunks), sep = "\n")
```
